verses.verse: And Moses <S%H4872><s%> with the elders <S%H2205><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> commanded <S%H6680><s%> <S%H853><s%> the people, <S%H5971><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> Keep <S%H8104><s%> <S%H853><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> the commandments <S%H4687><s%> which <S%H834><s%> I <S%H595><s%> command <S%H6680><s%> you this day. <S%H3117><s%>

And it shall be <S%H1961><s%> on the day <S%H3117><s%> when <S%H834><s%> ye shall pass over <S%H5674><s%> <S%H853><s%> Jordan <S%H3383><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> the land <S%H776><s%> which <S%H834><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> thy God <S%H430><s%> giveth <S%H5414><s%> thee, that thou shalt set thee up <S%H6965><s%> great <S%H1419><s%> stones, <S%H68><s%> and plaster <S%H7874><s%> them with plaster: <S%H7875><s%>

And thou shalt write <S%H3789><s%> upon <S%H5921><s%> them <S%H853><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> the words <S%H1697><s%> of this <S%H2063><s%> law, <S%H8451><s%> when thou art passed over, <S%H5674><s%> that <S%H4616><s%> <S%H834><s%> thou mayest go in <S%H935><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> the land <S%H776><s%> which <S%H834><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> thy God <S%H430><s%> giveth <S%H5414><s%> thee, a land <S%H776><s%> that floweth <S%H2100><s%> with milk <S%H2461><s%> and honey; <S%H1706><s%> as <S%H834><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> God <S%H430><s%> of thy fathers <S%H1><s%> hath promised <S%H1696><s%> thee.

Therefore it shall be <S%H1961><s%> when ye be gone over <S%H5674><s%> <S%H853><s%> Jordan, <S%H3383><s%> that ye shall set up <S%H6965><s%> <S%H853><s%> these <S%H428><s%> stones, <S%H68><s%> which <S%H834><s%> I <S%H595><s%> command <S%H6680><s%> you this day, <S%H3117><s%> in mount <S%H2022><s%> Ebal, <S%H5858><s%> and thou shalt plaster <S%H7874><s%> them with plaster. <S%H7875><s%>

And there <S%H8033><s%> shalt thou build <S%H1129><s%> an altar <S%H4196><s%> unto the LORD <S%H3068><s%> thy God, <S%H430><s%> an altar <S%H4196><s%> of stones: <S%H68><s%> thou shalt not <S%H3808><s%> lift up <S%H5130><s%> any iron <S%H1270><s%> tool upon <S%H5921><s%> them.

Thou shalt build <S%H1129><s%> <S%H853><s%> the altar <S%H4196><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> thy God <S%H430><s%> of whole <S%H8003><s%> stones: <S%H68><s%> and thou shalt offer <S%H5927><s%> burnt offerings <S%H5930><s%> thereon <S%H5921><s%> unto the LORD <S%H3068><s%> thy God: <S%H430><s%>

And thou shalt offer <S%H2076><s%> peace offerings, <S%H8002><s%> and shalt eat <S%H398><s%> there, <S%H8033><s%> and rejoice <S%H8055><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> thy God. <S%H430><s%>

And thou shalt write <S%H3789><s%> upon <S%H5921><s%> the stones <S%H68><s%> <S%H853><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> the words <S%H1697><s%> of this <S%H2063><s%> law <S%H8451><s%> very plainly. <S%H874><s%> <S%H3190><s%>

And Moses <S%H4872><s%> and the priests <S%H3548><s%> the Levites <S%H3881><s%> spoke <S%H1696><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> Israel, <S%H3478><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> Take heed, <S%H5535><s%> and hearken, <S%H8085><s%> O Israel; <S%H3478><s%> this <S%H2088><s%> day <S%H3117><s%> thou art become <S%H1961><s%> the people <S%H5971><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> thy God. <S%H430><s%>

Thou shalt therefore obey <S%H8085><s%> the voice <S%H6963><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> thy God, <S%H430><s%> and do <S%H6213><s%> <S%H853><s%> his commandments <S%H4687><s%> and his statutes, <S%H2706><s%> which <S%H834><s%> I <S%H595><s%> command <S%H6680><s%> thee this day. <S%H3117><s%>
And Moses <S%H4872><s%> charged <S%H6680><s%> <S%H853><s%> the people <S%H5971><s%> the same <S%H1931><s%> day, <S%H3117><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%>

These <S%H428><s%> shall stand <S%H5975><s%> upon <S%H5921><s%> mount <S%H2022><s%> Gerizim <S%H1630><s%> to bless <S%H1288><s%> <S%H853><s%> the people, <S%H5971><s%> when ye are come over <S%H5674><s%> <S%H853><s%> Jordan; <S%H3383><s%> Simeon, <S%H8095><s%> and Levi, <S%H3878><s%> and Judah, <S%H3063><s%> and Issachar, <S%H3485><s%> and Joseph, <S%H3130><s%> and Benjamin: <S%H1144><s%>

And these <S%H428><s%> shall stand <S%H5975><s%> upon mount <S%H2022><s%> Ebal <S%H5858><s%> to <S%H5921><s%> curse; <S%H7045><s%> Reuben, <S%H7205><s%> Gad, <S%H1410><s%> and Asher, <S%H836><s%> and Zebulun, <S%H2074><s%> Dan, <S%H1835><s%> and Naphtali. <S%H5321><s%>

And the Levites <S%H3881><s%> shall speak, <S%H6030><s%> and say <S%H559><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> the men <S%H376><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> with a loud <S%H7311><s%> voice, <S%H6963><s%>

Cursed <S%H779><s%> be the man <S%H376><s%> that <S%H834><s%> maketh <S%H6213><s%> any graven <S%H6459><s%> or molten image, <S%H4541><s%> an abomination <S%H8441><s%> unto the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> the work <S%H4639><s%> of the hands <S%H3027><s%> of the craftsman, <S%H2796><s%> and putteth <S%H7760><s%> it in a secret <S%H5643><s%> place. And all <S%H3605><s%> the people <S%H5971><s%> shall answer <S%H6030><s%> and say, <S%H559><s%> Amen. <S%H543><s%>

Cursed <S%H779><s%> be he that setteth light <S%H7034><s%> by his father <S%H1><s%> or his mother. <S%H517><s%> And all <S%H3605><s%> the people <S%H5971><s%> shall say, <S%H559><s%> Amen. <S%H543><s%>
Cursed <S%H779><s%> be he that removeth <S%H5253><s%> his neighbor's <S%H7453><s%> landmark. <S%H1366><s%> And all <S%H3605><s%> the people <S%H5971><s%> shall say, <S%H559><s%> Amen. <S%H543><s%>

Cursed <S%H779><s%> be he that maketh the blind <S%H5787><s%> to wander <S%H7686><s%> out of the way. <S%H1870><s%> And all <S%H3605><s%> the people <S%H5971><s%> shall say, <S%H559><s%> Amen. <S%H543><s%>

Cursed <S%H779><s%> be he that perverteth <S%H5186><s%> the judgment <S%H4941><s%> of the stranger, <S%H1616><s%> fatherless, <S%H3490><s%> and widow. <S%H490><s%> And all <S%H3605><s%> the people <S%H5971><s%> shall say, <S%H559><s%> Amen. <S%H543><s%>

Cursed <S%H779><s%> be he that lieth <S%H7901><s%> with <S%H5973><s%> his father's <S%H1><s%> wife; <S%H802><s%> because <S%H3588><s%> he uncovereth <S%H1540><s%> his father's <S%H1><s%> skirt. <S%H3671><s%> And all <S%H3605><s%> the people <S%H5971><s%> shall say, <S%H559><s%> Amen. <S%H543><s%>

Cursed <S%H779><s%> be he that lieth <S%H7901><s%> with <S%H5973><s%> any manner <S%H3605><s%> of beast. <S%H929><s%> And all <S%H3605><s%> the people <S%H5971><s%> shall say, <S%H559><s%> Amen. <S%H543><s%>

Cursed <S%H779><s%> be he that lieth <S%H7901><s%> with <S%H5973><s%> his sister, <S%H269><s%> the daughter <S%H1323><s%> of his father, <S%H1><s%> or <S%H176><s%> the daughter <S%H1323><s%> of his mother. <S%H517><s%> And all <S%H3605><s%> the people <S%H5971><s%> shall say, <S%H559><s%> Amen. <S%H543><s%>
Cursed <S%H779><s%> be he that lieth <S%H7901><s%> with <S%H5973><s%> his mother-in-law. <S%H2859><s%> And all <S%H3605><s%> the people <S%H5971><s%> shall say, <S%H559><s%> Amen. <S%H543><s%>
Cursed <S%H779><s%> be he that smiteth <S%H5221><s%> his neighbor <S%H7453><s%> secretly. <S%H5643><s%> And all <S%H3605><s%> the people <S%H5971><s%> shall say, <S%H559><s%> Amen. <S%H543><s%>

Cursed <S%H779><s%> be he that taketh <S%H3947><s%> reward <S%H7810><s%> to slay <S%H5221><s%> an innocent <S%H5355><s%> person. <S%H5315><s%> And all <S%H3605><s%> the people <S%H5971><s%> shall say, <S%H559><s%> Amen. <S%H543><s%>

Cursed <S%H779><s%> be he that <S%H834><s%> confirmeth <S%H6965><s%> not <S%H3808><s%> all <S%H853><s%> the words <S%H1697><s%> of this <S%H2063><s%> law <S%H8451><s%> to do <S%H6213><s%> them. And all <S%H3605><s%> the people <S%H5971><s%> shall say, <S%H559><s%> Amen. <S%H543><s%>
